mapper.sql: SELECT /* prTmplBase.TemplateList */ PTB.TMPL_NO , PTB.TMPL_NM , PTB.TMPL_PATH_NM || PTB.TMPL_FILE_NM AS TMPL_FILE_PATH , (CASE WHEN PTB.USE_YN='Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '사용안함' END) AS USE_YN , FN_GET_CODENAME( 'DP004', PTB.TMPL_TYP_CD ) AS TMPL_TYP_CD FROM PR_TMPL_BASE PTB WHERE PTB.TMPL_NO LIKE #{tmplNo} || '%' AND PTB.TMPL_NM LIKE #{tmplNm} || '%' AND PTB.USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' AND PTB.TMPL_TYP_CD LIKE #{tmplTypCd} || '%' ORDER BY PTB.TMPL_NO

WITH TMPL AS ( /* prTmplBase.DisplayTemplateList */ SELECT COUNT(PTCMI.CONR_NO) AS CONR_CNT , TMPL_NO FROM PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO PTCMI GROUP BY PTCMI.TMPL_NO ) SELECT PTB.TMPL_NO , PTB.TMPL_NM , PTB.TMPL_PATH_NM || PTB.TMPL_FILE_NM AS TMPL_FILE_PATH , PTB.USE_YN , PTB.TMPL_TYP_CD , COALESCE(TMPL.CONR_CNT,0) || '개' AS CONR_CNT , '' AS CONR_INSERT , PTB.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(PTB.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_TMPL_BASE PTB LEFT OUTER JOIN TMPL ON ( PTB.TMPL_NO = TMPL.TMPL_NO ) WHERE PTB.TMPL_NO LIKE #{tmplNo} || '%' AND PTB.TMPL_NM LIKE #{tmplNm} || '%' AND PTB.TMPL_TYP_CD LIKE #{tmplTypCd} || '%' ORDER BY PTB.TMPL_NO
mapper.select: SELECT /* prTmplBase.checkPrTmplConrMappInfo */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_TMPL_CONR_MAPP_INFO WHERE TMPL_NO = #{tmplNo}
SELECT /* prTmplBase.checkPrDispConrInfo */ COUNT(*) FROM PR_DISP_CONR_INFO WHERE CONR_NO = #{conrNo}
